topic.title: EMS Current Medication Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67844-1" EMS Current Medications Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67791-4" Currently on medication (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
If EHistory.12 has the value "None Reported," the value is "False" If EHistory.12 has the value "Refused" or "Unable to Complete," the value is "NI"; the original value may be recorded in Observation.text.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69749-0" Patient on anticoagulants (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
If EHistory.12 has the value "No anticoagulants," the value is False
